top_stories.title: Roblox is locking down sexual content and access to ‘adult’ locations after lawsuits
top_stories.description: Roblox is updating its policies prohibiting romantic or sexual content to also forbid “content, settings, or behavior that implies sexual activity,” according to a Friday post from chief safety officer Matt Kaufman (emphasis Kaufman’s). The changes follow recent lawsuits against the company, including one from Louisiana Attorney General Liz Murrill that alleges the platform creates […]
top_stories.author: Jay Peters

top_stories.title: NVIDIA, National Science Foundation Support Ai2 Development of Open AI Models to Drive U.S. Scientific Leadership
top_stories.description: NVIDIA is partnering with the U.S. National Science Foundation (NSF) to create an AI system that supports the development of multimodal language models for advancing scientific research in the United States. The partnership supports the NSF Mid-Scale Research Infrastructure project, called Open Multimodal AI Infrastructure to Accelerate Science (OMAI). “Bringing AI into scientific research has Read Article
top_stories.author: Jack Wells
top_stories.content: NVIDIA is partnering with the U.S. National Science Foundation (NSF) to create an AI system that supports the development of multimodal language models for advancing scientific research in the United States. top_stories.title: ChatGPT’s mobile app has generated $2B to date, earns $2.91 per install
top_stories.description: On average, the app is generating close to $193 million per month, up from $25 million last year.
top_stories.author: Sarah Perez
top_stories.content: On average, the app is generating close to $193 million per month, up from $25 million last year.

top_stories.title: Elastic wins 2025 Google Cloud DORA Award for Architecting for the Future with AI
top_stories.description: We’re thrilled to announce that Elastic has been honored with the 2025 Google Cloud DORA Award for Architecting for the Future with AI. Google Cloud DORA awards recognize organizations that have demonstrated significant advancements by applying DORA principles to improve their software delivery and operational performance with Google Cloud.As we scaled our engineering teams at Elastic, we realized the need for a more data-driven approach to DevOps performance. We turned to Google Cloud’s DORA...
top_stories.author: Brian Bergholm,Lon Holden,Aleta Hubbell,Valerio Arvizzigno,Yuvraj Gupta

top_stories.title: The End of Limitless Compute: AI’s Physical Reality
top_stories.description: For developers, compute has long been an abstraction—a limitless resource summoned with an API call. That illusion is now shattering against hard physical realities. The voracious appetite of AI means the success of your next application may depend less on the elegance of your algorithm and more on your cloud provider’s ability to navigate aContinue reading "The End of Limitless Compute: AI’s Physical Reality" The post The End of Limitless Compute: AI’s Physical Reality appeared first on...
